March 14, 1970 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-fourth-section
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK 1st annual spring contest. 5 bands competed
March 24, 2013, 3:31 p.m. May 20, 2015, 8:01 p.m.
1 Topsham Silver Band J. Chiverton Recollections of Mendelssohn
2 Holsworthy Town Band F. Rowland Voices of Youth
3 Hartland Town H. Dayman Third Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals
Unknown Result Lostwithiel Youth M. W. Sweet
Unknown Result Weymouth Silver D. Taylor
